Cain.name: Cain
Cain.desc: A web developer and cybersecurity analyst by day and piracy guide writer by night, Cain has been writing (and coding) for Morris Motel since its inception.

AnvilKilo.name: AnvilKilo
AnvilKilo.desc: A devilishly handsome autistic mess who's always on cocaine or pirating something.

MrMeatBones.name: MrMeatBones
MrMeatBones.desc: The original owner of the DeezNuts sequel (Morris Motel), MrMeatBones has been writing guides primarily on Servarr setups.
